text: Va on kason, ki cun kore zist kunand jo ʙa xud sitame kunand, azoʙi Allohro ʙa jod ovarda dar hol Allohro jod mekunand va ʙaroi gunohoni xes omurzis mexohand va kist cuz Alloh, ki gunohonro ʙijomurzad? Va cun ʙa ʙadii gunoh ogohand, dar on ci mekardand, ʙardavom naʙosand. Va onon medonand, ki agar tavʙa kunand, Alloh ononro meʙaxsad
